description: Three scientists in lab coats appear disoriented, indicated by swirling stars above their heads. One holds a boomerang, while another covers his mouth in consternation, and the third looks concerned. The absurdity lies in these seemingly intelligent individuals being utterly perplexed and distressed by a simple object that keeps returning, treating it as a mysterious and unsolvable problem they must find a way to discard.
caption: "Egad! We must find some means of discarding the hideous thing!"
